```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data("instacart")


insta =
instacart %>%
  select(aisle,department,product_name, order_dow, order_hour_of_day)%>%
  mutate(order_dow=recode(order_dow,
       "0"="Sunday",
       "1"="Monday",
       "2"="Tuesday",
       "3"="Wednesday",
       "4"="Thursday",
       "5"="Friday",
       "6"="Saturday"),
       order_dow=as.factor(order_dow))%>%
  filter(department %in% c("alcohol", "babies", "frozen", "bulk", "meat seafood", "bakery", "breakfast"))
  
```
